problem.title: CheckPoint: Angular Momentum of Point Masses
problem.script: #Enter the computations here m=random.choice([0.06,0.15,0.24]) L=random.choice([0.8,1.2,1.5]) o=random.choice([0.8,2.5,4.8]) A=50* m* L* L* o B=20* m* L* L* o C=10* m* L* L* o D=20* m* L* L* o E=10* m* L* L* o F=12.5* m* L* L* o
problem.p: A light rigid rod of length \(3s \) where s = $L m has small spheres of masses m = $m kg, 2m, 3m and 4m attached as shown. The rod is spinning in a horizontal plane with angular speed \(\omega \) = $o rad/s about a vertical axis.
Find the magnitude of angular momentum of the rod in each case. Enter your answers in [kg.m2.s-1].
Part A. The axis of rotation is passing through mass m.
Part B. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 2m.
Part C. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 3m.
Part D. The axis of rotation is passing through mass 4m.
Part E. The axis of rotation is passing through the center of mass of the configuration.
Part F. The axis of rotation is passing through the midpoint of the rod.
